document.full_text: bomb attacks in northern ireland have doubled over the last year, police figures showed on thursday, evidence that dissident pro-irish nationalists have stepped up activities to try to derail political stability.
document.title: bomb attacks double in northern ireland
lines_and_colors: bomb attacks in northern ireland have doubled over the last year, police figures showed on thursday, evidence that dissident pro-irish nationalists have stepped up activities to try to derail political stability.
